item.description:
With Olga Kaminsky, RMT

Learn this wonderful healing modality and change your life!
After this certification you will be able to do Reiki on yourself and others. Reiki is great for bringing your life into balance and helping you heal on physical, emotional and spiritual levels.

Why Choose Reiki?

  • Releases tension and stress and provides deep relaxation
  • Increases energy and sense of well being
  • Reduces blood pressure
  • Helps with the side effects of medications
  • Eases depression and connects to more positive outlook on life
  • Supports immune system
  • Helps relieve pain
  • Aids better, more restful sleep
  • Assists the body in cleansing itself from toxins
  • Helps spiritual growth and emotional healing

Reiki 1 is focused on helping you heal yourself, but you will also learn how to offer Reiki to family and friends and use it in every day situations.

What is included in your class

  • You will gain ability to practice Reiki on yourself and others
  • Overview of Reiki history
  • Theoretical and practical applications of energy healing
  • Simple meditative techniques
  • Workbook binder with Reiki I materials
  • Journal
  • Greater satisfaction with your life

And if you are a healing practitioner already, Reiki is a great tool to have for the well-being of your clients! They are sure to tell you that they feel more relaxed during your regular services.

This class meets for 5 Saturdays. Attendance at all of them is necessary in order to receive certification.

 

When: Saturdays, starting on September 10, 10:00 - 11:30am  Cost: $108
item.how_to_find_us: Please check Directions page at www.eternal-balance.com if you have not been to the studio before.
item.name: Reiki 1 Certification
